modified: This post has been modified since it was last saved. Changes will not appear publicly yet. To persist modifications, click Save
published: This post has already been published and can be viewed publicly. Any saved changes will instantly be visible
scheduled: This post has been scheduled to publish at the following date/time. It will not be publicly available until then and any changes will not be seen as an edit
not_published: This post is in a draft state and cannot be view publicly. Any changes prior to publishing will not be seen as an edit
confirm_save_published:
This blog entry is already published. Saved changes will be immediately visible to users and search engines.
Click OK if you are sure.
confirm_publish:
Blog entry will be visible to users or search engines.
Click OK if you are sure.
confirm_unpublish:
Blog entry will no longer be visible to users or search engines.
Click OK if you are sure.
confirm_archive:
Archiving this entry will remove it from the main list view.
Click OK if you are sure.
confirm_unarchive:
Unarchiving this entry will put it back into the main list view.
Click OK if you are sure.
confirm_delete:
Please type YES in capitals if you are sure you want to delete this entry.
This action is non-reversible, you should consider archiving instead.
new_post_contents: This is a content editable field. Click here to start editing. Full markdown is supported in here.
In addition to the markdown support, you also get the following features:
Non-markdown markup is also supported, like <u>underline</u> <sup>super</sup> and <sub>sub</sub> script
Custom class mappings for prettifying elements allows you to customize the
markdown further. For example, you can add classes to make images responsive using
the UI framework of your choice.
